title: Bellator 232 discussion thread
text:
UNCASVILLE, Conn. – MMA Junkie is on scene and reporting live from Saturday’s Bellator 232 event at Mohegan Sun Arena in Uncasville, Conn., which kicks off at 6:45 p.m. ET (3:45 p.m. PT). You can discuss the event here.

Be sure to follow along with the latest card updates in our Bellator 232 live results post, and then discuss the event in the comments section below.

Round-by-round updates and official results begin at approximately 6:45 p.m. ET for the preliminary card and 10 p.m. ET for the main card.
description: Bellator 232 takes place Saturday in Connecticut, and you can discuss the event here.
